trans-unit.source: Represents a <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem"></xref> that is published in the editing context and that indicates whether the [!INCLUDE[wf2](~/add/includes/wf2-md.md)] designer is in a read-only state.
trans-unit.target: Representa um <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem"> </xref> que é publicada no contexto de edição e que indica se o [!INCLUDE[wf2](~/add/includes/wf2-md.md)] designer estiver no estado somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: Visual elements can bind to this property in order to provide different behavior in a read-only state (such as the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.ExpressionTextBox> disallowing edits and setting the state to “Disabled”).
trans-unit.target: Elementos visuais podem associar a esta propriedade para fornecer um comportamento diferente em um estado somente leitura (como o <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.ExpressionTextBox>desabilitação de edições e configurar o estado para "Desativado").</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.ExpressionTextBox>

trans-unit.source: If a hosting application would like to set the designer to a read-only state, this <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem> can be retrieved and can be set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se um aplicativo de hospedagem gostaria de definir o designer para um estado somente leitura, isso <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem>podem ser recuperados e pode ser definido como `false`.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Hosting.ReadOnlyState"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Hosting.ReadOnlyState"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the object is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o objeto é somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the object is read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o objeto é somente leitura; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo do objeto atual.
